TopicTitle: Parts act weird in orbit after switching back to them from tracking station.

Articles.Content:
So, after creating a basic relay satellite in KSP2 using 4 batteries, a satellite dish, a HECS2, and 2 solar arrays + a docking port, a weird bug appears in which the batteries and docking port raise up to create almost a staircase effect.

Image: https://ibb.co/yBwsm2N

It doesn't impair gameplay, nor are the parts unanchored/can detach from the actual relay probe. It's just annoying and ruins the look of the relay probe.

Thank you!
